appName.description: The name of the application, should not be translated

appShortName.description: The short name of the application, should not be translated

appDescription.message: Orodje za namestitev, upravljanje in uporabo progresivnih spletnih aplikacij (PWA) v Mozilla Firefox

actionInstallSite.description: Instruct users that they can install the current site here

actionLaunchSite.description: Instruct users that they can launch the current site here

updateNotificationTitle.description: The title of the update notification, displayed when an update is available

updateNotificationMessage.message: Na voljo je posodobitev PWAsForFirefox. Kliknite obvestilo, da prikažete navodila za posodobitev.
updateNotificationMessage.description: The message of the update notification, displayed when an update is available

commonError.description: Displayed before error messages or as a popup title

commonWarning.description: Displayed before warning messages or as a popup title

commonNote.description: Displayed before note messages or as a popup title

commonClose.description: Displayed as a label for a close button

commonCancel.description: Displayed as a label for a cancel button

commonLoading.description: Displayed when things are still loading

webAppName.description: The name property of a web app

webAppDescription.description: The description property of a web app

webAppCategories.description: The categories property of a web app

webAppKeywords.description: The keywords property of a web app

webAppStartURL.description: The start URL property of a web app

webAppIconURL.description: The icon URL property of a web app

webAppID.description: The ID property of a web app

webAppProfile.description: The profile property of a web app

webAppProtocolHandlers.description: The protocol handlers property of a web app

profileName.description: The name property of a profile

profileDescription.description: The description property of a profile

profileTemplate.description: The template property of a profile

profileTemplatePlaceholder.description: The placeholder for the template input

profileID.description: The ID property of a profile

webAppValidationNameReuse.message: Imena aplikacije ne morete ponovno uporabiti
webAppValidationNameReuse.description: A validation error when the web app name is reused

webAppValidationStartURLInvalid.message: Začetni URL mora biti veljaven URL
webAppValidationStartURLInvalid.description: A validation error when the web app start URL is invalid

webAppValidationStartURLScope.message: Začetni URL mora verjetno biti v območju:
webAppValidationStartURLScope.description: A validation warning when the web app start URL is out-of-scope, with the scope displayed after the colon

webAppValidationIconURLInvalid.message: URL ikone mora biti veljaven URL
webAppValidationIconURLInvalid.description: A validation error when the web app icon URL is invalid

webAppValidationProfileLimit.message: Namestite lahko samo eno instanco na profil
webAppValidationProfileLimit.description: A validation error when multiple web app instances are tried to be installed in the same profile

installPageTitle.description: The title of the install web app page

installPageCreateProfile.description: The profile creation option on the install web app page

installPageAutoCreateProfile.description: The automatic profile creation option on the install web app page

installPageSeparateProfiles.message: Zaradi napake, ki jo je težko odpraviti, je priporočljivo, da vsako spletno aplikacijo namestite v ločen profil. Za več podrobnosti glejte .
installPageSeparateProfiles.description: The message that tells users each web app should be in a separate profile on affected platforms

installPageUseManifestLabel.message: Uporabi manifest za določanje lastnosti aplikacije
installPageUseManifestLabel.description: The label for the use manifest checkbox on the web app installation page

installPageUseManifestTooltip.message: Onemogočite samo, če te spletne aplikacije ne morete namestiti z omogočenim manifestom
installPageUseManifestTooltip.description: The tooltip for the use manifest checkbox on the web app installation page

installPageLaunchNowLabel.description: The label for the launch now checkbox on the web app installation page

installPageLaunchNowTooltip.message: Omogočite, če želite, da se aplikacija samodejno zažene, ko je nameščena
installPageLaunchNowTooltip.description: The tooltip for the launch now checkbox on the web app installation page

installPageContentScriptError.message: Do podatkov o strani ni mogoče dostopati.
installPageContentScriptError.description: A message that says the extension was not able to access the content script

installPageContentScriptErrorDevelopment.message: Uporabljate razvojno različico, zato je to verjetno posledica funkcije "live-reloading". Napako lahko odpravite tako, da jo onemogočite ali uporabljate produkcijsko različico.
installPageContentScriptErrorDevelopment.description: A message that extends the content script error with more details when a development build is used

installPageContentScriptErrorRestricted.message: Nekatere Mozilline spletne strani so omejene za razširitve. To je varnostna funkcija Firefoxa in je ni mogoče onemogočiti. Teh spletnih strani ni mogoče namestiti kot spletne aplikacije.
installPageContentScriptErrorRestricted.description: A message that extends the content script error with more details when used on restricted domains

launchPageTitle.description: The title of the launch web app page

launchPageInstallNewInstance.description: Displayed on the launch web app page to install a new instance

managePageTitle.description: The title of the manage page

managePageTabGrid.description: The grid tab on the manage page

managePageTabApps.description: The apps tab on the manage page

managePageTabProfiles.description: The profiles tab on the manage page

managePageTabSettings.description: The settings tab on the manage page

managePageAppListIcon.description: The icon alternative text on the web app list

managePageAppListLaunch.description: The launch tooltip on the web app list

managePageAppListEdit.description: The edit tooltip on the web app list and the title of the edit web app dialog

managePageAppListRemove.description: The remove tooltip on the web app list and the title of the remove web app dialog

managePageAppListEmpty.description: A message that is displayed on the web app list when no web apps are installed

managePageAppListAdd.description: A button that is displayed on the web app list to install the current site

managePageProfileListCreate.description: The create tooltip on the profile list and the title of the edit profile dialog

managePageProfileListEdit.description: The edit tooltip on the profile list and the title of the edit profile dialog

managePageProfileListRemove.description: The remove tooltip on the profile list and title of the remove profile dialog

managePageProfileListEmpty.description: A message that is displayed on the profile list when no profile are available

managePageProfileListAdd.description: A button that is displayed on the profile list to create a new profile

managePageProfileListUnnamed.description: The unnamed profile on the profile list

managePageProfileListCount.message: {count, plural, one {# aplikacija} two {# aplikaciji} few {# aplikacije} other {# aplikacij}}
managePageProfileListCount.description: The web app count in the profile, supports limited pluralization options

managePageSettingsDisplayPageAction.description: The setting for displaying page action (address bar widget)

managePageSettingsDisplayPageActionValid.description: The option to display page action on valid web apps

managePageSettingsDisplayPageActionAlway.description: The option to always display page action

managePageSettingsDisplayPageActionNever.description: The option to never display page action

managePageSettingsLaunchCurrentURL.description: The setting for launching web apps on active URLs

managePageSettingsShowUpdatePopup.description: The setting for showing update popups

managePageSettingsEnableAutoLaunch.description: The setting for enabling automatic launching

managePageSettingsEnablePortals.description: The setting for enabling XDG Desktop Portals (Linux-only)

managePageSettingsDarkMode.description: The setting for enabling dark mode

managePageSettingsDarkModeTooltip.message: Omogočite ga lahko v sistemskih nastavitvah
managePageSettingsDarkModeTooltip.description: The tooltip for the dark mode setting

managePageSettingsDefaultProfileTemplate.description: The setting for default profile template

managePageSettingsAutoLaunchExclusion.description: The setting for auto launch exclusion

managePageSettingsAutoLaunchExclusionPla.description: The placeholder for auto launch exclusion

managePageSettingsDefaultTabSiteGrid.description: The option to select web app grid as default tab

managePageSettingsDefaultTabSiteList.description: The option to select web app list as default tab

managePageSettingsDefaultTabProfiles.description: The option to select profiles as default tab

managePageSettingsDefaultTabSettings.description: The option to select settings as default tab

managePageSettingsUpdateWebApps.description: The button in settings to update web apps

managePageSettingsReinstallRuntime.description: The button in settings to reinstall runtime

managePageSettingsAboutProject.description: The button in settings to display project info

managePageFooterOutdated1.description: The first part of the extension outdated warning

managePageFooterOutdated2.description: The second part of the extension outdated warning

managePageFooterSearchPlaceholder.description: The search placeholder for web apps and profiles

managePageAppEditLaunchOnWebsiteLabel.description: The label for the launch on website checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditLaunchOnWebsiteTooltip.message: Določa, ali se bo spletna aplikacija samodejno zagnala ob obisku ustreznega spletnega mesta
managePageAppEditLaunchOnWebsiteTooltip.description: The tooltip for the launch on website checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditLaunchOnLoginLabel.message: Zaženi aplikacijo ob prijavi v sistem
managePageAppEditLaunchOnLoginLabel.description: The label for the launch on login checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditLaunchOnLoginTooltip.message: Določa, ali se bo spletna aplikacija samodejno zagnala ob prijavi v sistem
managePageAppEditLaunchOnLoginTooltip.description: The tooltip for the launch on login checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditLaunchOnBrowserLabel.description: The label for the launch on browser checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditLaunchOnBrowserTooltip.message: Določa, ali se bo spletna aplikacija samodejno zagnala ob zagonu brskalnika
managePageAppEditLaunchOnBrowserTooltip.description: The tooltip for the launch on browser checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditUpdateManifestLabel.description: The label for the manifest update checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditUpdateManifestTooltip.message: Določa, ali bo manifest posodobljen, ko uredite to spletno aplikacijo
managePageAppEditUpdateManifestTooltip.description: The tooltip for the manifest update checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditUpdateIconsLabel.description: The label for the icons update checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppEditUpdateIconsTooltip.message: Določa, ali bodo ikone posodobljene, ko uredite to spletno aplikacijo
managePageAppEditUpdateIconsTooltip.description: The tooltip for the icons update checkbox on the edit web app dialog

managePageAppRemoveQuestion.message: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to spletno aplikacijo?
managePageAppRemoveQuestion.description: The confirmation question on the remove web app dialog

managePageAppRemoveNotLast.message: V tem profilu so prisotne tudi druge aplikacije, zato profil ne bo odstranjen. Podatki aplikacije bodo ostali, vendar jih lahko odstranite prek brskalnika aplikacije ali tako, da izbrišete profil aplikacije.
managePageAppRemoveNotLast.description: The additional clarification on the remove web app dialog if the web app is not the last in its profile

managePageAppRemoveLast.message: To je zadnja aplikacija v tem profilu, zato ga lahko tudi izbrišete.
managePageAppRemoveLast.description: The additional clarification on the remove web app dialog if the web app is the last in its profile

managePageAppRemoveCheckboxLabel.description: The label for the profile delete checkbox on the remove web app dialog

managePageAppRemoveCheckboxTooltip.message: Določa, ali bodo trenutni profil aplikacije in podatki izbrisani med odstranjevanjem aplikacije
managePageAppRemoveCheckboxTooltip.description: The label for the profile delete checkbox on the remove web app dialog

managePageProfileEditApplyProfileLabel.description: The label for the apply template checkbox on the edit profile dialog

managePageProfileRemoveQuestion.message: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti ta profil? S tem boste popolnoma odstranili profil in vse povezane spletne aplikacije, vključno z njihovimi podatki. Tega dejanja morda ne boste mogli razveljaviti.
managePageProfileRemoveQuestion.description: The confirmation question on the remove profile dialog

managePageProfileRemoveDefault.message: Privzetega profila ni mogoče popolnoma odstraniti. Spletne aplikacije in podatki bodo izbrisani, profil pa bo ostal.
managePageProfileRemoveDefault.description: The additional clarification on the remove profile dialog if this is the default profile

managePageAutoLaunchTitle.description: The title of the automatic launching dialog

managePageAutoLaunchAboutMain.message: Če omogočite samodejni zagon spletnih aplikacij, se bodo vsi URL-ji, ki se ujemajo z obsegom vaših omogočenih spletnih aplikacij, samodejno zagnali kot spletne aplikacije.
managePageAutoLaunchAboutMain.description: The main clarification about the automatic launching

managePageAutoLaunchAboutExperimental.message: Ta funkcija je eksperimentalna, morda ne bo pravilno delovala z vsemi spletnimi mesti in lahko vpliva na učinkovitost delovanja. Dodatno jo je treba omogočiti za vsako spletno aplikacijo v njenih nastavitvah z možnostjo $OPTION$.
managePageAutoLaunchAboutExperimental.description: The experimental clarification about the automatic launching

option.example: Launch this web app on matching website

managePageAutoLaunchAboutPermissions.message: Za delovanje so potrebna dodatna dovoljenja brskalnika. Ko to funkcijo omogočite, se bo prikazalo okno za omogočanje dovoljenj.
managePageAutoLaunchAboutPermissions.description: The permissions clarification about the automatic launching

managePageAutoLaunchEnable.description: The enable button for the automatic launching

managePageUpdateWebAppsAbout1.message: S tem boste prenesli in razčlenili manifeste za vse vaše spletne aplikacije in jih znova registrirali v operacijski sistem. Vse spremembe v manifestih spletnih aplikacij se bodo odražale tudi v vašem sistemu.
managePageUpdateWebAppsAbout1.description: The first part of about updating web apps message

managePageUpdateWebAppsAbout2.message: Lahko pa registrirate vse spletne aplikacije v operacijski sistem brez izvajanja posodobitev manifesta. To je lahko uporabno, če ste svojo konfiguracijsko datoteko prenesli iz druge naprave.
managePageUpdateWebAppsAbout2.description: The second part of about updating web apps message

managePageUpdateWebAppsManifest.description: The checkbox label for performing manifest updates when updating web apps

managePageReinstallRuntimeAbout1.message: Ali ste prepričani, da želite znova namestiti izvajalnik PWAsForFirefox? S tem boste odstranili vaš trenutni izvajalnik in prenesli najnovejšo različico od Mozille.
managePageReinstallRuntimeAbout1.description: The first part of about reinstalling runtime message

managePageReinstallRuntimeAbout2.message: To ne bo vplivalo na vaš glavni brskalnik Firefox in ne bo odstranilo nobenih profilov ali drugih podatkov.
managePageReinstallRuntimeAbout2.description: The second part of about reinstalling runtime message

buttonWebAppInstallDefault.description: The web app button on the install web app page, allowing the user to install the web app

buttonWebAppInstallProcessing.description: The web app installation button on the install web app page, while the web app is installing

buttonWebAppInstallFinished.description: The web app installation button on the install web app page, after the web app has been installed

buttonCreateDefault.description: The create button, allowing the user to create something (profile)

buttonCreateProcessing.description: The create button, while something (profile) is being created

buttonCreateFinished.description: The create button, after something (profile) has been created

buttonEditDefault.description: The edit button, allowing the user to edit something (web app or profile)

buttonEditProcessing.description: The edit button, while something (web app or profile) is being edited

buttonEditFinished.description: The edit button, after something (web app or profile) has been edited

buttonRemoveDefault.description: The remove button, allowing the user to remove something (web app or profile)

buttonRemoveProcessing.description: The remove button, while something (web app or profile) is being removed

buttonRemoveFinished.description: The remove button, after something (web app or profile) has been removed

buttonUpdateDefault.description: The update button, allowing the user to update something (all web apps)

buttonUpdateProcessing.description: The update button, while something (all web apps) is being updated

buttonUpdateFinished.description: The update button, after something (all web apps) has been updated

buttonReinstallDefault.description: The reinstall button, allowing the user to reinstall something (runtime)

buttonReinstallProcessing.description: The reinstall button, while something (runtime) is being reinstalled

buttonReinstallFinished.description: The reinstall button, after something (runtime) has been reinstalled
